properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 2:33PM PST until January 7 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 25 kt
with localized gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 13 feet at 12
seconds expected. For the Gale Watch, south winds around 25 kt
with possible gusts up to 35 kt and seas 11 to 13 feet at 11
seconds possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR out 10
NM and Waters from Cascade Head to Florence OR from 10 to 60
NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 10 AM PST Tuesday.
For the Gale Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON
